locations.title: Pilot Travel Center
locations.content: Pilot Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Hello everyone I parked there on 6/11/2024 just for one hour go there just take shower and eat , when I come back to my truck it was unlocked and my truck cpc got stolen, after that happened we call 911 make the report, and then we speak …
The staff doesn't work at all, I waited 2 hours for a shower.
Poor management that should be replaced immediately and permanently. I had to wait for hours for the shower cuz nobody was there to clean it while the cleaners were there.

This is one of the worst pilot I came in to 2 showers available and I asked her reserve me a shower. She said our shower is not working. But two showers available  see it on the system. She’s just keep saying  our systems down. And six …
Upgrades. Upgrades. Has a lounge. New tvs. Blah blah blah blah.  Shower was good the cleaner was even better. Thx for the soap lol drive well.
Polite and courteous employees, restrooms were in need of cleaning and cleanness of shower was okay at best.. McDonalds in store, not our choice of good food. …
They need more showers. One year later here I am again. Drivers reserve your shower 3 or 4 hours in avance.

Long shower wait times , there is a lot of dropped trailers in the yard ! Lots of mechanical work being done and tire changes , I seen at least 3 different picks up trucks on the hour every hour circle the parking lot as if they were …

Showers were extremely out of hand ! Never got hot . Black mold everywhere. Shower smelled like sewer . I’m a truck driver I don’t get to shower daily . So for me to pay for a shower and not be able to enjoy hot water SUCKS!

Waited for a shower, and when it was my turn, the door code didn't work and they simply placed me again last in line. There were 11 drivers in line, and I had already waited for 7. After a long day of work we could use more sympathy from …
